remarks: Triangle-type inequality for span of a singleton of vector difference. (Contributed by NM, 25-Apr-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Jun-2014.)
statement:
lspsntrim.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lspsntrim.s $e |- .- = ( -g ` W ) $.
lspsntrim.p $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` W ) $.
lspsntrim.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lspsntrim $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V /\ Y e. V ) -> ( N ` { ( X .- Y ) } ) C_ ( ( N ` { X } ) .(+) ( N ` { Y } ) ) ) $.
